sentence.Network_en: The mission could conceivably be accomplished within a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 相信这个任务能在一个星期内完成。

sentence.Network_en: He couldn't conceivably have ( ie I don't believe he could have ) meant what he said.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的话想来不会是他的原意.

sentence.Network_en: So conceivably, this thing could be used to create a pandemic.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此可以想象, 这个仪器可以用来造成大瘟疫.

PerfectNetExp.abs: conceivable 可能的conceivably 想得到地conceive of 想象
LSAT红宝书1 - 豆丁网 ... complacency 满足,安心 conceivably 令人信服地 concomitant 伴随的;n.伴随物.
Chinese&nbsp;-&nbsp;English Free... ... 可以想象 = conceivable 可以想象 = conceivably 可以想象 = thinkable.
易方达基金管理有限公司 ... detract 减损 conceivably 可想象地 discretion 斟酌决定的自由.

list.abs: ...conceived vt.构思,以为,持有;vi 怀孕,考虑,设想,常用过去分词conceive prejudices抱偏见convinced adj. 确信的,深信的;v. 说服
Baby panda dies 熊猫宝宝不幸夭折 ... revive 抢救，使复活 conceived naturally 自然受孕 chronicled avidly 热情的记载和报道.
compensate for 补偿，赔偿conceive of 设想，构思出-
To beget and conceive offspring ; reproduce ., 生育和孕育后代 ; 繁殖.

entry.tran: 可想到的;可想象的;可以相信的
entry.def: If something is conceivable, you can imagine it or believe it.

example.ex: Without their support the project would not have been conceivable...
example.tran: 如果没有他们的支持，这个项目根本就不可想象。

example.ex: It is just conceivable that a single survivor might be found...
example.tran: 或许能找到一个幸存者，这不是没有可能。

auth_sentence.content: The only country that conceivably has influence is China.
auth_sentence.res_content: The only country that conceivably has influence is China.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only country that conceivably has influence is China.

auth_sentence.content: I could conceivably advance a persons perception of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could conceivably advance a persons perception of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could conceivably advance a persons perception of reality.

auth_sentence.content: The government could conceivably end up making money.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government could conceivably end up making money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government could conceivably end up making money.
